name: Modern Business Invoice
description: A modern, professional invoice with branding, payment instructions, and a clean layout. Ideal for small businesses and startups.

description: A black and white, print-friendly invoice inspired by Zoho. Features bold headers and a clear, itemized table.

name: Minimalist Invoice
